title: Black Rock
summary: Sarah travels with her friend Lou to spend the weekend camping in the remote Black Rock Island that was part of their childhood. When they arrive to get their motor boat, Lou sees Abby waiting for Sarah and they decide to give up traveling to the island. Lou and Abby were friends in the past but after an incident with Abby's boyfriends, they have been estranged for many years and do not talk to each other. However, Sarah convinces them to travel with her to Black Rock. When they are resolving their issues, they meet their former schoolmate Henry that is hunting with his friends from the army Derek and Alex that worship Henry and Abby invites them to have dinner and drink with them on the beach. Abby gets drunk and she flirts with Henry and he makes a move on her. There is a tragic accident with Henry and his friends decide to revenge him.
cast: Katie Aselton, Lake Bell, Kate Bosworth
